text:
Dear support,
I have installed jmeter in my system but it gets error like this , so please 
what is the soltion for the below problem.

#
# HotSpot Virtual Machine Error, Internal Error
# Please report this error at
# http://java.sun.com/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi
#
# Error ID: 43113F32554E54494D45110E4350500290
#

abnormal program termination


ragards
Ramesh Babu
creator: rameshbabu@pyxistechsol.com
sebb@apache.org
text:
JMeter may have caused the crash, but the fault lies in the Sun JVM.

JMeter uses Java only, so any JVM crashes indicate faults in the JVM, not 
JMeter.

You could try re-installing Java. If this does not fix the problem, I suggest 
you report the problem to Sun as the message says.
